name: Aliena Raptum
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 40 - compo(48 hour solo) version Theme: The more you have, the worse it is

This is an arcade game, where you play a Ufo on its continuing quest to abduct all the humans.

(The Humans will replenish over time, but every 5 abductees will cause the military to launch even more helicopters with even more health.

Movement - WASD Left Click to fire tractor beam Player will autofire at enemies

Beam up as many humans as you can. The more Humans you steal the more intense the you take the harder the military will fight back

(this is a second idea, after waking up on day one i decided to start over)
